item.title: Microsoft Cost Management updates—May 2025
item.description: Nobody wants a surprise when it comes to the bill, and this is where Microsoft Cost Management comes in. The post Microsoft Cost Management updates—May 2025 appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/microsoft-cost-management-updates-may-2025/
